title: Professor Derrible set to discuss climate change | College of Engineering | University of Illinois at Chicago

The panel, which is the last UIC Campus Conversation of the semester, is scheduled for Wednesday, Nov. 1, from noon to 1:30 p.m. in Student Center West, Michele Thompson Room A.  The panel will be discussing, What is Climate Change and What Can We Do About It?  Dr. Max Berkelhammer will moderate a discussion with UIC faulty members, which includes Derrible, Dr. Serap Erdal, Dr. Matt Wynter and Dr. Moira Zellner.  The discussion can be watched live at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ju77YK7Cly8 .      Modified on August 13, 2019
